Structs/Notice.html#/s:17PostgresClientK.abstract: The SQLSTATE code for the error. Not localizable.

Structs/Notice.html#/s:17PostgresClientK.abstract: If the error was associated with a specific constraint, the name of the constraint. Refer

Structs/ConnectionConfiguration.html#/s:.name: host
Structs/ConnectionConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: The hostname or IP address of the Postgres server. Defaults to localhost.

Structs/ConnectionConfiguration.html#/s:.name: port
Structs/ConnectionConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: The port number of the Postgres server. Defaults to 5432.

Structs/ConnectionConfiguration.html#/s:.name: ssl
Structs/ConnectionConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: Whether to use SSL/TLS to connect to the Postgres server. Defaults to true.

Structs/ConnectionConfiguration.html#/s:.name: database
Structs/ConnectionConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: The name of the database of the Postgres server. Defaults to postgres.

Structs/ConnectionConfiguration.html#/s:.name: user
Structs/ConnectionConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: The Postgres user name. Defaults to an empty string.

Structs/ConnectionConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: The credential to use to authenticate to the Postgres server. Defaults to

Structs/ConnectionConfiguration.html.abstract: The configuration for a Connection to the Postgres server.

Enums/PostgresError.html#/s:17PostgresCl.abstract: The Postgres server requires a Credential.cleartextPassword for authentication.

Enums/PostgresError.html#/s:17PostgresCl.name: connectionClosed
Enums/PostgresError.html#/s:17PostgresCl.abstract: An attempt was made to operate on a closed connection.

Enums/PostgresError.html#/s:17PostgresCl.name: cursorClosed
Enums/PostgresError.html#/s:17PostgresCl.abstract: An attempt was made to operate on a closed cursor.

Enums/PostgresError.html#/s:17PostgresCl.name: invalidParameterValue(name:value:requiredValue:)
Enums/PostgresError.html#/s:17PostgresCl.abstract: The Postgres server has a parameter set to a value incompatible with PostgresClientKit.

Enums/PostgresError.html#/s:17PostgresCl.name: md5PasswordCredentialRequired
Enums/PostgresError.html#/s:17PostgresCl.abstract: The Postgres server requires a Credential.md5Password for authentication.

Enums/PostgresError.html#/s:17PostgresCl.name: serverError(description:)
Enums/PostgresError.html#/s:17PostgresCl.abstract: The Postgres server reported an internal error or returned an invalid response.

Enums/PostgresError.html#/s:17PostgresCl.name: socketError(cause:)

Enums/PostgresError.html#/s:17PostgresCl.name: sqlError(notice:)

Enums/PostgresError.html#/s:17PostgresCl.name: statementClosed
Enums/PostgresError.html#/s:17PostgresCl.abstract: An attempt was made to operate on a closed statement.

Enums/PostgresError.html#/s:17PostgresCl.abstract: The authentication type required by the Postgres server is not supported by

Enums/PostgresError.html#/s:17PostgresCl.abstract: The value could not be converted to the requested type.

Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:17PostgresClientK.abstract: As the value of Logger.level, disables all logging.

Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:17PostgresClientK.abstract: As the value of Logger.level, logs all log records.

Enums/Credential.html#/s:17PostgresClien.abstract: Authenticates by MD5 hash of the username (ConnectionConfiguration.user), password, and

Enums/Credential.html.name: Credential
Enums/Credential.html.abstract: A credential for authenticating to the Postgres server.

Classes/Logger.html#/s:17PostgresClientK.name: level
Classes/Logger.html#/s:17PostgresClientK.abstract: The log level for this logger. Defaults to LogLevel.info.

Classes/Logger.html#/s:17PostgresClientK.abstract: The log handler for this logger. Defaults to a ConsoleLogHandler.

Classes/Cursor.html#/s:17PostgresClientK.name: rowCount
Classes/Cursor.html#/s:17PostgresClientK.abstract: The number of rows affected by the Statement.

Classes/Connection.html#/s:17PostgresCli.name: beginTransaction()
Classes/Connection.html#/s:17PostgresCli.abstract: Performs a SQL BEGIN command to explicitly initiate a transaction block.

Classes/Connection.html#/s:17PostgresCli.name: commitTransaction()
Classes/Connection.html#/s:17PostgresCli.abstract: Performs a SQL COMMIT command to commit the current transaction.

Classes/Connection.html#/s:17PostgresCli.name: rollbackTransaction()
Classes/Connection.html#/s:17PostgresCli.abstract: Performs a SQL ROLLBACK command to rollback the current transaction.

Classes/ConsoleLogHandler.html.name: ConsoleLogHandler
Classes/ConsoleLogHandler.html.abstract: A log handler that prints log records to standard output.
